string.text: What happened? He died? Immediately come back!
What happened? He died? Take measurements and immediately come back!
Good for you Strelok you got into the lab. It is very important to study the installation at that location. Try to disable it so that we can investigate it.

Listen, the prototype cannot, for too long a time, protect you from strong affects. So when you get a strong effect, then you turn on the timer. When time expires the prototype will cease to protect you. Be careful and do not forget about the timer.

Excellent work Strelok! Radiation is turned off and you are still alive. We have a couple of military helicopters killing off zombies. So be careful not to get hit by the shelling. Oh, by the way, stop by to visit us in the bunker.
